AGG Learning material

Follow along with the lesson plans here in order to learn how to create and edit webmaps. The lessons are meant to be followed in order as they build upon one another, but it is not necessary.

Lesson 1

Demo

This is the first lesson of the project. The intent of this lesson is to provide you with a basic handle on how to create a webmap and to understand the functions of the different components that make up a webmap.
